Transcend DrivePro 230 Dash Camera

Even in low light, the DrivePro 230 employs an Exmor sensor to shoot high-resolution photographs with outstanding, rich color. The Transcend DrivePro 230 Dash Cam delivers smooth film and sharp still photos with 1080P Full HD recording at 30fps. With its GPS/GLONASS receiver, built-in battery, convenient snapshot button, and Wi-Fi connectivity Transcend's DrivePro 230 dashcam is a feature-rich, modern dash camera. full_description:
Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam

The DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam from Transcend is designed specifically for motorcycle and scooter riders. Its straightforward and small design ensures your safety on the road. The Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam uses a STARVISTM image sensor to record Full HD 1080P at 60 frames per second for crystal clear clarity and night pictures even in low light. It is IP68 certified, meaning it can survive a wide range of weather conditions and is resistant to water, dust, heat, and shocks, making it ideal for outdoor recording. The free DrivePro App uses the built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to transmit live footage to mobile devices. It is easy to transport due to its tiny and portable nature. If you travel by scooter or work as a delivery driver, the DrivePro 20 is the dashcam for you. The DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam from Transcend is made for motorbikes and scooters. Its small size makes it simple to mount on a helmet. The Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam is ready to catch a ride with you after 3 seconds of pushing the power button. It has Wi-Fi connectivity that allows you to see and download real-time footage on your mobile devices using the DrivePro App. This implies that video evidence may be accessed quickly and easily for reporting occurrences to law police and insurance providers without having to remove the memory card. TheTranscend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam comes with a high-capacity Li-Polymer battery, allowing up to 2.5 hours of recording on a single charge. A micro USB to USB Type-A cable is provided that allows you to charge the dashcam from a computer or other devices with 5V output. The Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam is a multipurpose device that is small, portable, and simple to set up. It's perfect for motorcycle and scooter riders, as well as delivery businesses including mail and parcel delivery, motorcycle taxis, and food delivery. It may be used for a variety of things, like documenting your next picturesque road trip! The Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam comes with a 02-year warranty.

Transcend DrivePro Body 60 Cylindrical Camera

The DrivePro Body 60 Cylindrical Camera by Transcend has a small camera unit that is tethered to a control unit, allowing for a broad range of attachment possibilities. The durable and extremely responsive DrivePro Body 60 is designed specifically for public safety personnel and provides for high-definition evidence collecting as well as wireless data previews and transfers. The ExmorTM sensor in the Transcend DrivePro Body 60 Cylindrical Camera captures high-resolution photos with outstanding, rich color even in low light. The images are quite detailed, with little noise and a good balance of bright and dark areas. The Transcend DrivePro Body 60 Cylindrical Camera is made up of a control unit that is attached to a small camera unit that can be securely installed on shoulder harnesses or helmets, making it an excellent choice for shooting in the challenging situations that public safety personnel face daily. The DrivePro Body 60 is designed to interact with Transcend's DrivePro Body App, and it has Bluetooth wireless technology for simple setup and switching modes, as well as Wi-Fi connectivity for live video streaming on iOS and Android mobile devices. You can control the camera hands-free with Siri voice control if you link the DrivePro Body 60 to an iOS smartphone. Your task is made easier by having immediate and quick access to the gadget. The Transcend DrivePro Body 60 comes with a 02-year warranty.

full_description:
Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera

The Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera is a dual-lens dash camera that protects both drivers and passengers. The 180Â° rotatable rear lens is equipped with four infrared LEDs, allowing sharp in-car video recordings at night and in low light conditions. The front lens has a Sony Image Sensor and wide field of view for capturing crystal-clear full HD 1080P (30Fps) videos, while the 180Â° rotatable rear lens has a Sony Image Sensor and wide field of view for capturing crystal-clear full HD 1080P (30Fps) videos. The Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera dual-lens provides maximum protection for both drivers and passengers. It comes with a Transcend microSD memory card that is made of high-quality NAND flash and has been tested under extreme circumstances. The STARVISTM sensor in the front lens of the Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera captures high-resolution photographs in outstanding, rich color even in low light. The front lens supports 1080P Full HD recording at 60 frames per second, resulting in seamless motion and sharp still photographs. It also safeguards those who work behind the wheel for a living. The Transcend DrivePro 550 Dual Lens Dash Camera protects occupational drivers and helps ensure that standard operating procedures are followed by drivers in the taxi, express delivery, truck, and bus sectors. It is suitable for commercial for-hire transportation, shared transportation, and charter services. The DrivePro 550 has a built-in GPS/GLONASS receiver for geotagging videos and images. Users may observe routes traveled on a map display during video playback with the proprietary DrivePro Toolbox, making it simple to determine when and where an event happened. In the case of a power outage, the DrivePro dashcam's built-in Li-Polymer battery may temporarily provide power until the files being recorded are properly saved, preventing the loss of important photographs due to file damage. The Transcend DrivePro 550 comes with a 02-year warranty.

full_description:
Transcend DrivePro Body 30 Video Camera Camcorder

The DrivePro Body 30 Video Camera Camcorder by Transcend is a feature-rich body camera built primarily for public safety personnel. The DrivePro Body 30 is always ready for action, with 12-hour battery life, IP67 certified environmental sealing, military-grade shock protection, and a pre-event buffer. Image enhancement technologies with clear, high-definition evidence gathering using the STARVIS image sensor, high-quality lens, and automated infrared lighting, as well as image enhancement technologies with clear, high-definition evidence collection. A 360Â° rotating clip and a Velcro holder are also included in the box, allowing users to attach gadgets to uniforms, vests, or coats so they are always ready when duty calls. Users may operate the DrivePro Body 30 and manage films and photographs on the devices over Bluetooth and Wi-Fi when using Transcend's DrivePro Body App and Toolbox for smartphones and laptops. A comprehensive camera management solution is also available with Transcend's TS-DPD6N docking station. Two Ethernet connections, a LAN port for administrative configuration, and a WAN port for simultaneous data upload to a chosen folder while charging are included in the 6-port docking station. The Transcend DrivePro Body 30 Video Camera Camcorder has built-in 64GB storage for high-quality videos, and a DDR3 memory cache to temporarily store recorded videos. The Transcend DrivePro Body 30 comes with a 02-year warranty.
